sen.j: 西洞院 時直（にしのとういん ときなお、天正12年（1584年） - 寛永13年10月9日（1636年11月6日））は、安土桃山時代から江戸時代初期の公家。
sen.e: Tokinao NISHINOTOIN (1584 – November 6, 1636) was a court noble who was active during the period since Azuchi Momoyama Period until the early Edo period.

sen.j: 兄弟は西洞院時直（長男）、平松時庸（次男、平松家祖）、善忠、日勇、長谷忠康（五男、長谷家祖）、交野時貞（6男、交野家祖）、東福門院上臈の行子。
sen.e: He was the first son, and among his brothers and sisters, Tokitsune HIRAMATSU (the second son) who founded the Hiramatsu family, Yoshitada, Nichiyu, Tadayasu NAGATANI (the fifth son) who founded the Nagatani family, Tokisada KATANO (the sixth son) who founded the Katano family, and Gyoshi who served Tofukumonin as Joro (high rank female housekeeper), are known.
